      • assignTransliteration

        public java.lang.String assignTransliteration(java.lang.String[] cuneiwords,
                                     DictHandling dicthandler,
                                     TransliterationMethod transliterationMethod)
        Assigns a transliteration to a given segmented line.
        Parameters:
        cuneiwords - The line segmentation as String array
        dicthandler - the dicthandler needed for transliterating
        transliterationMethod - the transliteration method to choose
        Returns:
        the segmented, transliterated String

                         throws java.io.IOException
        Transforms a given fiel to the boundary representation.
        Parameters:
        filepath - the path of the file to transform
        chartype - the language in which the file is written
        testMethod - the test method to use
